content: since climbing ropes and draws come in a variety of bright colors i thought it would be fun to use them as a motif for a hat the hat was created to use relatively small amounts of fingering weight wool yarn rock climbing hat fits most adult sized heads first work the ribbing and then knit from a color chart i used knit picks palette yarns for the dark green version in these colors main color - larch heather 120 yds rope - orange 15 yds rope contrast - lingberry 15 yds quick draw/sling - tarragon 20 yds carabiner - silver 25 yds
